title: 3 and Out - Broncos $4.5 Bil Bargain, Browns/Watson Debacle, Baker Red Flags, Headlines
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Broncos $4.5 Bil Bargain, Browns/Watson Debacle, Baker Red Flags, Headlines
description:
John explains why the Broncos are a steal even at their massive $4.5 billion price tag, why Brandon Staley is the only thing that can derail the stacked Chargers, why the Browns and Deshaun Watson marriage seems like a guaranteed disaster, why Baker Mayfield still doesn’t get it, why Ryan Fitzpatrick’s remarkable career is only possible in the NFL. He also touches on the day's top headlines, including Kyler Murray at Cardinals OTA's, and the pressure on Zach Wilson to make a second year leap.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates. Go to  FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd
